channel.title: How do i fix this error on my 317 client

it says Error: Packet Lost Type 2 Refreshing Connection
please post on here thanks!!

item.title: How do i fix this error on my 317 client
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Go to Player.java, under:

[code]playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);[code]
Add:

playerProps.writeByte(skulls); playerProps.writeByte(hints);
Then, under:

public abstract class Player implements Constants {

Add:

public int skulls = 0; public int hint = 0;
Tell me if it works/doesn’t work.[/code][/code]

Read full topic

@Godsent wrote:

please post on here thanks!![/quote]
This is because you are attempting to leach a client that has alot of work put into it, enough work to cause this if you don’t read the GODDAMN FUCKING POST!
